issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: LocalizerRunner should give DIE action when all resources are localized

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
killing ContainerLocalizer action doesn't take effect when private localizer receives FETCH_FAILURE status. This is a typo from YARN-3024. With YARN-3024, ContainerLocalizer will be killed only if {{action}} is set to {{LocalizerAction.DIE}}, calling {{response.setLocalizerAction}} will be overwritten. This is also a regression from old code.
Also it make sense to kill the ContainerLocalizer when FETCH_FAILURE happened, because the container will send CLEANUP_CONTAINER_RESOURCES event after localization failure.
fields.summary: killing ContainerLocalizer action doesn't take effect when private localizer receives FETCH_FAILURE status.

comments.body: Hi [~xgong], Could you review the patch YARN-3516.000.patch? This is a very small change to fix a regression. thanks
